title: Design AKS Network Architecture & Terraform Modules
description: Define VNet subnets, NSGs, and CIDR ranges. Create base Terraform module structure for AKS.
sprint_goal: Establish the cloud foundation, security baseline, and audit logging infrastructure.
acceptance_criteria: Network topology diagram approved; Terraform module skeleton created; IP address plan validated

title: Implement AKS Cluster Resource Definition
description: Write Terraform code for AKS Managed Cluster, Node Pools, and RBAC integration with Azure AD.
sprint_goal: Establish the cloud foundation, security baseline, and audit logging infrastructure.
acceptance_criteria: Cluster provisions successfully; Node pools configured; Azure AD RBAC enabled

title: Configure ACR and AKS Attachment
description: Provision Azure Container Registry and configure AcrPull role assignment for AKS kubelet identity.
sprint_goal: Establish the cloud foundation, security baseline, and audit logging infrastructure.
acceptance_criteria: ACR provisioned; AKS can pull images without secrets; Vulnerability scanning enabled

title: Validate Infrastructure Security (tfsec)
description: Run tfsec against all modules and remediate critical/high vulnerabilities.
sprint_goal: Establish the cloud foundation, security baseline, and audit logging infrastructure.
acceptance_criteria: Zero critical/high issues in tfsec report; Encryption verified; NSGs verified

title: Design Geospatial Entity Model & Repository
description: Define TypeORM entity for ServiceCenter with Geometry column. Design repository methods for spatial queries.
sprint_goal: Establish the cloud foundation, security baseline, and audit logging infrastructure.
acceptance_criteria: Entity definition includes Geometry column; Migration script created; Spatial index defined

title: Implement Audit Log Consumer
description: Implement NestJS consumer for Service Bus to index critical actions into OpenSearch.
sprint_goal: Establish the cloud foundation, security baseline, and audit logging infrastructure.
acceptance_criteria: Events persisted to OpenSearch; No PII logged in clear text; Backpressure handled

title: Implement ST_Contains Query Logic
description: Write TypeORM query builder logic to find service centers covering a given lat/long point.
sprint_goal: Deliver core backend logic for products and routing, and enable admin configuration UI.
acceptance_criteria: Query returns correct ServiceCenters; Handles edge cases; Execution < 100ms

title: Implement Round-Robin Assignment Strategy
description: Implement Redis-based counter to distribute load among multiple eligible service centers found by geo-lookup.
sprint_goal: Deliver core backend logic for products and routing, and enable admin configuration UI.
acceptance_criteria: Atomic counter increment; Correct rotation; Fallback logic

title: Create Routing Service API Endpoint
description: Expose the routing logic via a REST endpoint accepting lat/long and returning assigned Service Center.
sprint_goal: Deliver core backend logic for products and routing, and enable admin configuration UI.
acceptance_criteria: POST endpoint active; Input validation; Returns 404 appropriately

title: Implement Invoice OCR Worker
description: Implement background worker for processing invoice uploads using Azure AI Document Intelligence.
sprint_goal: Deliver core backend logic for products and routing, and enable admin configuration UI.
acceptance_criteria: Handles PDF/Image; Retries on failure; Updates product entity

title: Develop Super Admin Service Area Map Editor
description: Develop React component using Mapbox GL JS to draw and edit service center territories.
sprint_goal: Deliver core backend logic for products and routing, and enable admin configuration UI.
acceptance_criteria: Draw polygon; Edit vertices; Validate GeoJSON; Save to API

title: Setup React Native Background Location Permissions
description: Configure Info.plist and AndroidManifest.xml. Implement permission request logic using react-native-permissions.
sprint_goal: Focus on mobile technician capabilities including real-time tracking and offline resilience.
acceptance_criteria: Permission dialogs correct; Graceful denial handling; Background modes enabled

title: Implement Background Service & GPS Capture
description: Integrate library to capture coords even when app killed/backgrounded.
sprint_goal: Focus on mobile technician capabilities including real-time tracking and offline resilience.
acceptance_criteria: Coords captured in background; Auto-restart on Android; Persistent notification

title: Implement WebSocket Client for Location Sync
description: Connect to backend WebSocket. Buffer locations when offline and flush when connected. Throttling logic.
sprint_goal: Focus on mobile technician capabilities including real-time tracking and offline resilience.
acceptance_criteria: Secure WSS connection; Throttled updates; Offline queue syncing

title: Setup WatermelonDB Schema & Migration
description: Configure local SQLite database with WatermelonDB. Define schema for Jobs, Actions, and SyncQueue.
sprint_goal: Focus on mobile technician capabilities including real-time tracking and offline resilience.
acceptance_criteria: DB initializes on both platforms; Schema supports entities; Migrations defined

title: Implement Offline Action Queue Logic
description: Create mechanism to intercept API calls when offline and persist them to SyncQueue table.
sprint_goal: Focus on mobile technician capabilities including real-time tracking and offline resilience.
acceptance_criteria: Requests stored offline; Correct serialization; FIFO order preserved

title: Implement Synchronization Manager
description: Process monitoring network state. Replay queue when online. Handle success/failure responses.
sprint_goal: Focus on mobile technician capabilities including real-time tracking and offline resilience.
acceptance_criteria: Auto-sync on reconnect; Retry logic for 5xx; Queue cleanup on success

title: Implement Conflict Resolution & Error UI
description: UI for users to handle 4xx errors (e.g., job already closed). Strategy for data conflicts.
sprint_goal: Focus on mobile technician capabilities including real-time tracking and offline resilience.
acceptance_criteria: User notified of failures; UI to discard/retry; Last-Write-Wins logic

title: Geospatial Performance Optimization & Load Testing
description: Conduct load testing on routing logic, analyze query plans, and tune PostGIS indexes/Redis configuration.
sprint_goal: Deliver core backend logic for products and routing, and enable admin configuration UI.
acceptance_criteria: P95 latency < 200ms; Index usage confirmed; No timeouts

title: Implement Integration Tests for Routing
description: Write integration tests using Testcontainers (Postgres + Redis) to verify end-to-end routing flows.
sprint_goal: Deliver core backend logic for products and routing, and enable admin configuration UI.
acceptance_criteria: Happy path covered; No-coverage edge case covered; Round-robin persistence verified
